versions.notes: v0.3.2 - added circularity and emissions performance class.
v0.3.2 - added circularity and emissions performance class.
fixed bugs and added link / secure link object.
v0.3.0 : flattened structure, simplified naming, complete descriptions, added sample values.
v0.2.3 : removed ID types (eg PartyID) and instead used the Identifier type as the parent for each identified object.
v0.2.2 : technical release to setup webhook integration with GitHub
v0.2.1 : add more classes from conformity credential and map names to schema.org
v0.2.0 : add more classes so this is a nearly complete library, refactor to have {class}ID types that can be used for simple references.
v0.1.1 : patch release to fix VC issuer subject structure.
v0.1.0 : refactor to align with VCDM and identifier model. Also add product class and extensions.
v0.0.3 : revert Verifiable Credential issuer to a simple URI (DID) from a Party object
v0.0.2 : [jsonld.contextOmit]=true to exclude VCDM protected names
